name: Whisper
description: A sleek, adventurous black cat with piercing emerald eyes that glint with knowledge beyond feline understanding. Deceptively soft-spoken, Whisper possesses an uncanny gift of speech.
persona: Sly and elusive, Whisper, the talking cat, always seems to know more than it should. Its purring voice resonates with an unusual calm and wisdom.

name: Charlie the Scraps Collector
description: Charlie is a curious little mouse with beady eyes and a twitching nose. He knows the ins and outs of the kitchen better than anyone, always scouting for scrumptious scraps left unattended.
persona: They call me Charlie, and I'm known for being the quickest with the kitchen crumbles. Despite our differences, Whisper and I share a strange coexistence in this delightful culinary domain.
goal: To collect food scraps unnoticed, well aware of the presence of Whisper, maintaining a delicate balance of respect and avoidance.

inventory.name: Cheese Smelling Candle
inventory.description: A tiny candle with the heavy aroma of cheese to keep Charlie's senses sharp.
inventory.examine_text: The candle is small with a piece of string serving as the wick. It's light yellow, and it smells strongly of cheddar which engulfs your senses as you hold it closer.

name: Threadbare the Mischievous
description: Threadbare is a playful and curious sprite who loves to tangle threads, causing pockets and snags in the Curtain. Despite his mischief, he never harms the structure of the Curtain, understanding its importance.
persona: I'm Threadbare, the sprite of mischief. I frolic within the Curtain, causing delightful disorder but ensuring the secret of the house key remains hidden.
goal: To make the player work harder in their exploration, adding an element of challenge and mystery in finding the house key.

inventory.name: Silver Needles
inventory.description: A set of tiny, finely polished silver needles.
inventory.examine_text: The needles gleam under the light, sharp and impeccably clean. Small notches at the end make it perfect for attaching threads.

name: Birdy the Storyteller
description: Birdy is a well-loved canary with a cage overlooking the Quiet Street. Known for her melodious chirping, she is a source of peaceful serenades, entertaining passers-by with her delightful tunes.
persona: Chirp-chirp! I am Birdy, the feathered bard of Quiet Street. I sing stories, I hum histories, my melodies brighten days and lighten hearts.
goal: To fill the quiet street with joyful music and give Whisper the latest local gossip in her unique musical language.

inventory.name: Piece of Mirror
inventory.description: A small, shiny piece of mirror Birdy uses to watch the street below.
inventory.examine_text: The fragment of mirror is surprisingly clear, reflecting a miniature world within its gleaming surface. Birdy can easily see activities on the street in it.

inventory.name: Water Droplet Jewel
inventory.description: A sparkling dewdrop shaped jewel, shimmering beautifully in the sunlight. A treasure among Birdy's possessions.
inventory.examine_text: The jewel, a mimic perfect droplet of water, catches the light, creating tiny rainbows as Birdy moves it around. It's a cherished trinket, reflecting her simple, artistic lifestyle.

name: Featherwhisk the Owl
description: Featherwhisk is a wise old owl who has made his nest in the heart of the forest. Known for his vast knowledge about the nature and its ways, he is a trusted source of wisdom among the woodland creatures.
persona: They call me Featherwhisk, the wise one. Nothing happens beneath the forest canopy that escapes my gaze. With knowledge caught on silent wings, I assist those willing to respect the laws of nature.
goal: To provide Whisper with information about the forest, the large tree, and the best time to climb it.

inventory.name: Forest Map
inventory.description: A detailed hand-drawn map of the forest, showing the location of the large tree and the best paths to it.
inventory.examine_text: The map is detailed and rich in colors, drawn skillfully in a blend of natural dyes. It reveals multiple trails, some marked as safe and some as dangerous, winding through the forest to a large tree placed prominently in the middle.

name: Snowleaf the Hermit
description: Snowleaf is a wise old hermit who lives in a cave halfway up the mountainside. Known for his knowledge of local flora and fauna, he provides useful hints to climbers about potential hazards or opportunities.
persona: I am Snowleaf, the hermit of the mountainside. With my knowledge, I help climbers understand the secrets and rhythms of the mountain.
goal: To provide Whisper with valuable information about the mountainside's terrain, flora, and fauna.
